properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 15 at 2:27PM AKST until January 17 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and the Bering Strait.

* WHEN...Until midnight Thursday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 60 mph will cause whiteout
conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is
likely. The Blizzard conditions are occuring at Savoonga today,
but are expected to spread to Gambell, Wales and Little Diomede
on Thursday. Conditions are expected to improve after midnight
Thursday night when winds begin to decrease.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST THURSDAY NIGHT
